title: Static VoucherCard Component
description: Replace the dynamic card renderer for vouchers with a static VoucherCard.tsx component. No conditional type-checking at render time. Card displays: name, value (formatted as currency), issuer, expiry date. Includes photo icon (if image attached) and copy/link icon. Full details accessible via modal.
acceptance_criteria: Displays: name, value (₪ formatted), issuer, expiry date on card face
Photo icon visible only when image_url is present
Copy icon copies voucher code to clipboard
Click opens VoucherDetailModal with full info + original screenshot
No dynamic type-checking — component only handles Voucher type
Styled with project palette: burgundy (#630606) accents, cream (#F5F2E7) background
Grid layout works on mobile (1 col), tablet (2 col), desktop (3 col)
files_to_touch: Remove old dynamic card renderer references for voucher type
notes: Check existing dynamic card component to understand current props and behavior before replacing. Preserve all existing functionality, just make it static.
